nodes.text: Barpotomous Drebble's headquarters was the home of Captain Barpotomous Drebble in the capital city of the planet Stenos. As the leader of a substantial portion of the capital, Drebble ran his business out of the building, and his supporters guarded the building inside and out. Drebble kept the Dancing Goddess, an award he had received for his efforts in aiding the Rebellion, inside his headquarters. During the rise of the Alliance of Free Planets, General Lando Calrissian and Chewbacca visited Drebble's headquarters and retrieved the Dancing Goddess in order to avert a disaster on the planet Godo.
